name: Forest Dump
description:
The Forest is dying.

The Spooky Shadows have polluted it, and you are the only one who can save it... because you have legs!

In this point and click adventure you play as a Forest Rescue Spirit that has been summoned to clean up a dirty forest dump and help it's inhabitants. Befriend a nerdy Forest, enjoy the beautiful scenery, complete wholesome quests and meet the cutest forest creatures.
